Package no.ntnu.idata.shiporganizer.shiporganizerservice.service

Class ProductService

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idata.shiporganizer.shiporganizerservice.service.ProductService
@Service public class ProductService extends Object
The Product service. Gets data from the Product repository modifies it and passes it to the controller

      public String setNewStock(String productNo, String username, int quantity, float longitude, float latitude, String date)
      Increases or decreases the stock for a specific product.
      Parameters:
      productNo - the product number
      username - the username
      quantity - the quantity
      longitude - the longitude
      latitude - the latitude
      date - the current date and time send from the client
      Returns:
      Successful if update is successful

    • createNewProduct

      public boolean createNewProduct(String productName, String productNumber, int desiredStock, int stock, String barcode, String department, String dateTime)
      Creates a new product
      Parameters:
      productName - the new products name
      productNumber - the new products number
      desiredStock - the new products desired stock
      stock - the new products stock
      barcode - the new products barcode
      department - the department the product show under
      dateTime - the current date and time send from the client
      Returns:
      boolean True if the record is inserted and false if not

      Returns:

      public boolean editProduct(int id, String productName, String productNumber, int desiredStock, String barcode, String department, String dateTime)
      Updated the information on a product
      Parameters:
      id - the updated products id
      productName - the updated products name
      productNumber - the updated products number
      desiredStock - the updated products desired stock
      barcode - the updated products barcode
      department - the department the product show under
      dateTime - the current date and time send from the client
      Returns:
      boolean True if the record is updated and false if not

    • createPdf

      public void createPdf(List<Product> products, String email, String[] recipients, String department)
      Creates the pdf with correct content and calls the mailService to send the email with the pdf
      Parameters:
      products - List of products to be orders
      email - the user who generated the reports email
      recipients - List of recipients to receive the email
      department - the users department
